importR 1.1.1
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Introduction to importing data with importR

    Import a dataset

    import.Rd

    This import function can import data from delimited text files, EXCEL spreadsheet, and statistical packages such as SAS, SPSS, and Stata.

    import(file, ...)

    Arguments

    file

    data file to import.

    ...

    parameters passed to the import function.

    Value

    a data frame

    Details

    The import function is a wrapper for the haven, readxl, rjson, and vroom packages.

    Note

    Complex nested JSON files will not be imported properly.

    See also

    read_sas, read_dta, read_spss, read_excel, fromJSON, vroom

    Examples

    if (FALSE) {

#import a comma delimited file
mydataframe <- import("mydata.csv")

#import a SAS binary file
mydataframe <- import("mydata.sas7bdat")

#import the second worksheet of an Excel workbook
mydataframe <- import("mydata.xlsx", sheet = 2)

#prompt for a file to import
mydataframe <- import()
}
